Text.val: 14.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
22.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
12.09.2006 AK SCR11812 add 2 parameters when calling prog'OPH411B BankTransferA'
-- If changes were made in OPH411B, then the overview has to be built again
-- If something was changed in OPH411B then TEMP_OPH411A has to be

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(BCNB_CHANGESNETBALANCE) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/bcnb where BCNB_ADMNO=:2 and BCNB_LEDG_NO=:3 :4 FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS
select cast(sum(LGCD_AMOUNTDEBIT-LGCD_AMOUNTCREDIT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/LGCD where LGCD_ADMNO=:2 and LGCD_LDGR_NO=:3 and LGCD_DEBITCREDITCHECK = 'N' :4 FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS
